title: RHOP Karen's Homecoming + RH*C Taglines + UPS Detour

description:
Danny recaps this week's RHOP, which featured Karen's homecoming parade, and Robyn's tax issues. Danny also touched on Cynthia's wedding and the newly released RH*C taglines, PLUS a Linda UPS detour.


RHOP Recap: 12:38ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
